InstalledItem.Name: Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Multitask on the battlefield with this remote turret system. Featuring precise controls and a wide field of fire, the turret allows pilots to add combat support to their resume.

InstalledItem.Name: Scorpion GT-215 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

The Scorpion GT-215 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Scorpion is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Name: Cryo-Star SL
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span
Size: 0
Grade: B
Class: Civilian

J-Span’s done it again. The Cryo-Star SL incorporates the same consumer award winning performance and durability you’ve come to expect from a Cryo-Star, but now available for smaller vehicles.

InstalledItem.Name: Defiant
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 0
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

In this cutthroat universe, the competition doesn’t stop when you do. That’s why you need the Defiant industrial power plant equipped in your vehicle. It’s optimized by the experts at Juno Starwerk to provide unmatched performance compared to other components in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: Sens
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 0
Grade: B
Class: Military

The cutting-edge GNP Sens design elevates radar technology to meet or exceed the specifications used by most military organizations operating today.

InstalledItem.Name: Castra
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

When performance meets price for vehicle shield generators, the Castra is the clear winner. It has been a Whitley’s Guide “Best Buy” for five consecutive years.
